actionUnits.condition: Call HouseController.changeLights() on House. MonoBehaviour (component fileID 821553098848002451, m_Script guid 340adb04e4e259e4b9c3e716ea2e6ced) matches the provided script HouseController and is configured in-scene with windowGlassObjects [821553098795559414, 821553099003664447, 821553098404871707, 821553099487161785], lightsOnEmissionColor (HDR), lightsOffEmissionColor (HDR), lightStatus=false, switchSound->AudioSource fileID 821553098848002450. No m_Calls (UnityEvent) entries are defined, so this method must be triggered manually to validate emission updates. Expected result: for each windowGlassObject, its Renderer.material _EmissionColor becomes lightsOffEmissionColor and _EMISSION keyword is enabled. Note: switchSound.Play() only happens when Update detects a change in lightStatus; this Trigger will not play audio.
